1423450.name: Tactical Force
1423450.description:
Tactical Force is a game that will always require you and your friends to come up with the best strategy to complete the objectives.

Your mission will be to enter places taken over by strange creatures. You never know where they come from and what they want. But they are attracted to strange devices that must be deactivated to control the population of these creatures. Of course it won't be that simple, they won't let you destroy the devices so easily and that's why you'll have to gather your friends to help you.

Creatures will not always be the same, they have their own ways of acting and their own abilities. When in doubt....avoid taking the risk....or not.
Every new season, new creatures

Creepy scenarios and simple mechanics will provide you with a lot of fun.
A co-op for up to 8 players for have fun with friends



Join the Tactical Force team, call your friends and let the combat begin!
1423450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
